sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.client

Class ActivityService

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.util.rest.WebClient
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.util.rest.RestClient
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.ivda.activity.client.ActivityService

  • @Singleton
public class ActivityService
extends RestClient
    Created by Seky on 22. 7. 2014.

    HTTP client pre sluzbu UACA. Ktory stahnie prvu stranku, poskytne udaje, stiahne druhu stranu atd. Client cachuje odpovede do CACHE_FOLDER zlozky.
